result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Reo L Covington

records.addlTxt:
11:12 AM Attorney Jacob A Idlas in court for Reo L Covington.  Prosecuting attorney Frank John Remington in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is in custody however, due to a malfunction with the secure elevator, was not able to appear personally. Parties stipulated to waive defendant's appearance.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on December 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.
per statute speedy trial demand cannot proceed until information is filed.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not be at People Ready Temp Service Agency.
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial Judge - Br 5

4:18 PM Defendant Reo L Covington in court, in custody.  Attorney Diana Maria Van Rybroek in court for Reo L Covington.  Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.
Status conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on October 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.
